Author: GitHixy
Name: LootView
Punchline: Comprehensive loot tracking with statistics and analytics
Description: Track all your loot with detailed statistics, duty tracking, history browser, trends analysis, and data export. Features modern UI with customizable styles and transparency. NEW in 1.3.0: 'loop of' crafting tracking, 'is added to your inventory' message support, 'The' prefix item name matching, Show On Duty Start setting, Item Blacklist system with right-click context menu. v1.2.6: Enhanced crafting synthesis tracking (coil/plank/length/stack/bolt of items), sack of Nuts support.
